rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
Once each turn, you may cast a spell from the top of your library.
Whenever you cast a spell from a library, create a 1/1 blue Elemental creature token with vigilance.
notes:
alt aquarius Guicaimumu Guicaimumu
RAREGEND
“The past is a maze, and the future a riddle. Best to have all the answers now.”
